text:
Who is at risk for Respiratory Failure? ?,"People who have diseases or conditions that affect the muscles, nerves, bones, or tissues that support breathing are at risk for respiratory failure. People who have lung diseases or conditions also are at risk for respiratory failure. For more information, go to ""What Causes Respiratory Failure?""",NHLBI,Respiratory Failure
What are the symptoms of Respiratory Failure ?,"The signs and symptoms of respiratory failure depend on its underlying cause and
